messages.message: Thank you for connecting! Any relation to a Jeff?
Jeff is my son! Hope you are well have not heard much from you since you left EPIC.

Really? He manages swiftpage? I just had an interview there I think it went well. I've been working on an EdTech company with this guy Stephen Houghton. Brilliant and generous guy. I tried to reach out to Nancy a few times, I guess it makes sense she didn't pass it on. How are you?

Yes, we are pretty proud of Jeff! He loves product management, and recently completed a master's program in data analytics, and is thriving with it. (He is also getting his MBA through a university in Chicago). I left EPIC in 2015, crazy story, but happy to be where I am today. What position are you interviewing for at Swiftpage?
Data science is awesome I've been going to meetups. He should talk to my friend Aneesh, owner of quitdata.com

Brian, I am a huge Maxwell fan, so I read most of what he puts out. In fact I read his daily readers each morning! I think it is great that your generation are also finding value with his work!!! We need strong leaders for the future.
Companies like swiftpage and yours understand the power of education as a form of process improvement. I am amazed at how many corporations do not value human efforts like we do. ;)

E.g. IBM caught laying way more people off than usual instead of repurposing them.
http://fortune.com/2017/02/16/tech-jobs-layoffs-microsoft-intel/

When you asked me "why isn't this done yet?" We should have played this game:
https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/5_Whys

Ha!

He is amazing! We are pretty proud of him! And yes he is 6'9" tall. Ironically his sister is only 5'6". He got his Dad's genes... I talked with him tonight, said the two of you met today, and their team is excited to have you on board!!! I wish you nothing but the best Brian!
